title: Jason Lowrey’s ‘Softwar’ removed from circulation and MIT library for unknown reasons
description:
Jason Lowrey, the author of Softwar: A Novel Theory on Power Projection and the National Strategic Significance of Bitcoin, has withdrawn his book from public access, prompting speculation among readers and academics alike. The work, which was presented as a thesis to the System Design and Management Program at MIT in February 2023, has additionally […]

The post Jason Lowrey’s ‘Softwar’ removed from circulation and MIT library for unknown reasons appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Crypto Analyst Predicts $XRP Price Could Skyrocket to $26 During Next Bull Run
description: A prominent cryptocurrency analyst has recently made a bold price prediction for the native token of the XRP Ledger, $XRP, suggesting it could rise to a staggering price point between $25 and $30 in the next cryptocurrency bull run. The analyst, going by Captain Faibik on the microblogging platform X, punctuated his forecast with a […]
